meanings.definition: A winding or twisting course or movement.
meanings.sent1: The river took many serpentines through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The hiking trail serpentines up the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chased its tail in serpentines around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed serpentines, leading her to unexpected conclusions.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved gracefully, creating serpentines with her body.

meanings.definition: A type of rock that is characterized by a smooth, shiny appearance.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found beautiful serpentines in the quarry.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry was made from polished serpentines.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a picture of a dragon resting on a bed of serpentines.
meanings.sent4: The lake reflected the sunset, resembling a sheet of serpentines.
meanings.sent5: The countertop was made of green serpentines, adding elegance to the kitchen.
